testcase.name: addon events with existing trolley
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: addon events with existing trolley Given an API client with valid credentials ... passed in 0.000s And I have an existing trolley with items from "7AB" in it ... passed in 0.231s When I fetch addon events for my trolley ... passed in 0.148s Then I get a list of addon events ... passed in 0.000s And the addon event list contains "7AC" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: upsell events without a trolley
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: upsell events without a trolley Given an API client with valid credentials ... passed in 0.000s And my customer wants tickets to "7AB" ... passed in 0.153s When I fetch upsell events for the tickets ... passed in 0.146s Then I get a list of upsell events ... passed in 0.000s And the upsell event list does not contain "7AB" ... passed in 0.000s And the upsell event list contains "7AA" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
